TopicTitle: I need a texturer and a cfg editor to make a 3 person team

Articles.Content:
kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=14677.0

I need 2 people to help my with the Konstellation and other part sets (up link for konstellarion)

-1 texturer for the uv maping etc...

-1CFG editor to make the CFG data mesh etc...

I will be te modeller.

The 3 members of the 'unnamed' team have the same reward.

The deplovement method is:

-we decide the parts we will do

-i modell and add material

-I give the 3d models to texturer

and he make the textures

-We revise the texture and model

-The cfg editor makes the cfg and more dating of the model

-All of we test and get up the models

(I dont know how to make animations)

Texturer:

cfg\'s: kevinlacht

requeriments:

-Know how to use blender

-Have experience in their camp

-Be generous and sociable

Ok, I\'m pretty good in CFG work.

When I try to make my own part there\'s always something wrong with the texture, so that\'s why I want the CFG work, it\'s pretty easy and I always try to keep on the deadline. But one negative point, my English reading/writing isn\'t really good but I think that that don\'t will be fatel . I want to work as soon as possible.

If you really need a textures man I can maybe try it.
